summary: This is a U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (DOJ OIG) Digital Forensics Cyber Investigations Office examination request form. It requests a forensic examination of a desktop computer seized from Michael Thomas on August 11, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The examination aims to establish a timeline of user activities and search for events occurring on August 9-10, 2019.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Individual whose desktop computer was seized from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 11, 2019, prompting a digital forensics examination request.

events.title: Seizure of Michael Thomas's computer
events.description: A desktop computer belonging to Michael Thomas was seized at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: Forensic examination request submitted
events.description: The DOJ OIG Cyber Investigations Office submitted a formal request for a digital forensics examination of the seized computer.

keyFacts: A desktop computer was seized from Michael Thomas at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 11, 2019.
The DOJ OIG Cyber Investigations Office requested a forensic examination on August 13, 2019, to analyze user activity and search for events from August 9-10, 2019.
The case is identified as a priority case (2019_010614).
The examination goals include establishing a timeline of users and reviewing activities on the device.
